author.organization: National Institute of Information and Communications Technology

abstract.t: This document discusses the requirements of on-path telemetry for multicast traffic using In-situ OAM. Applying In-situ OAM for multicast telemetry presents some unique challenges. This document provides the solutions based on the In-situ OAM trace option and direct export option to support the telemetry data correlation and the multicast tree reconstruction without collecting redundant data.
